Cold Mountain (2003)

Runtime:
154'
Overview:
Cold Mountain is the film adaptation of the novel by the same name from Charles Frazier. A star-studded film taking place in North Carolina during the Civil War. The film portrays civilian life during the war from the perspective of a woman who has been left behind as the men fight.
Genre:
Drama, Romance, War
Country:
United States of America
Language:
English, Italian
Trailer:
Tomatometer:
71%
  • 2003: N Best Actor at Academy Awards
  • 2003: W Best Supporting Actress at Academy Awards
  • 2003: W Best Supporting Actress at Screen Actors Guild

Similar Films:

  • Australia (2008)
  • The Patriot (2000)
